title: Don’t Forget to Enter the Summer Vibes Contest and Win Radavist Embroidered Ripton Jorts… and More!
content:
The Radavist is stoked to be partnering with Summer Vibes Bike Rally & Run Festival for an incredible VIP giveaway, and we’ve got a lot up for grabs, including Radavist-branded Ripton jorts for men or women. Read on for the full prize scoop!

ENTER TO WIN HERE! ENTER TO WIN HERE! ENTER TO WIN HERE!

  • Grand Prize: A Trek Checkpoint SL5 AXS Gen 3 gravel bike, 2-night hotel stay at the A-Lodge in Lyons, 2 pairs of Ripton x Radavist jorts, & 2 ticket upgrades to VIP passes at Summer Vibes.
  • Second Place winner: 2 pairs of Ripton x Radavist jorts
  • Third Place: 2 VIP upgrades to Summer Vibes Bike Rally & Run Festival.
  • Earn multiple contest entries by following the Instagram page, registering for Summer Vibes, joining The Radavist and Summer Vibes newsletters, and spreading the word about the event! There is no purchase necessary to enter. (Travel to Colorado is NOT included in the grand prize.) Contest ends on June 1, 2025!

Check out our original post for the full Summer Vibes 411 and ENTER TO WIN HERE!
